sentences.en: Despite the salesperson's blandishments, the customer did not buy the outfit.
sentences.cn: 尽管售货员百般奉承, 但是这位顾客还是不买这套设备.

sentences.en: He is the stony - hearted expug, committed deep within him, despite all blandishments, to anarchy and loot.
sentences.cn: 他就是那个铁石心肠的前拳击家, 表面上虽然阿谀逢迎, 心底里却尽转着天下大乱, 杀人越货的念头.

sentences.en: He liked the stony - hearted expug, committed deep within him, despite all blandishments, to anarchy and loot.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢这个铁石心肠的前拳击家, 表面上虽然阿谀逢迎, 心底里却尽转着天下大乱, 杀人越货的念头.

sentences.en: He remained impervious to all Nell's sulks and blandishments.
sentences.cn: 对尼尔的愠怒和甜言蜜语,他都无动于衷.

sentences.en: Influencing the local press has always been part of ISI operations, usually through bribes, blandishments or intimidation.
sentences.cn: 给当地媒体施压也是情报局经常做的事，通常通过行贿、哄骗或胁迫影响媒体。

sentences.en: It is high time for us to destroy the blandishments in the commercial advertisements.
sentences.cn: 现在是时候了,我们摧毁花言巧语的商业广告.

sentences.en: She charmed the visitor with the arsenal of her blandishments.
sentences.cn: 她用无数的甜言蜜语迷住了访客.
她把他的甜言蜜语顶了回去.

sentences.en: Their economic blandishments take the form of the so - called joint industrial enterprises.
sentences.cn: 所谓经济引诱,就是 所谓 “合办实业”.

trans.tran_cn: 甜言蜜语，奉承话，哄骗，诱惑
